Package extra.server

Class StockBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • extra.server.StockBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BrokerService, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class StockBroker
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements BrokerService
    Represents communication between customers and the investment bank.
    Author:
    Xiao Peng Ye, Daniel Tomas Sanchez, Aaron Cabero Blanco, Juan Diego Valencia Marin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • sendQuotation

        public boolean sendQuotation()
        Sends daily quotations contained in a list to registered clients if there are days remained. Otherwise do nothing.
